description:
Quench even the most sensitive skin with Simple Kind to Skin Replenishing Rich Moisturiser. This moisturiser offers the perfect blend of multivitamins and skin-loving ingredients to keep your skin replenished and moisturised. This moisturiser contains no harsh chemicals and carries on working for up to 12 hours from application.

Product Features:

  • Contains pro-vitamins B5 and vitamin E
  • Moisturises for up to 12 hours
  • No artificial perfumes, colours and no harsh chemicals
  • Dermatologist tested and approved
  • Suitable for sensitive skin
  • Contents: 125 ml
name: Simple 125ML
